page.title: 13ENTERTAINMENT IN DIPTON.
page.content: {Julie Wilson goes Disco Dancing to the {Hibernian Club in Stanley.We begin {with warm-up exercises & then practice {our routines to Pop Music.We have {exams annually.I am up to Silver grade {& will soon be up to Gold.We have been {as far as Sheffield for competitions. Bridgette Morrison's Grandad sings at Charity Concerts in the local Working- Men's Clubs.He prefers to sing Neil Diamond's songs.He sometimes sings duets with Grandma Cunningham. {Helen Crowl is in the Derwentsiders {Jazz Band.It is for chidren aged from {3 to 18.We give Marching displays to {Music.We play 3 instruments;base drum, {side drum,& kazoo.We win medals when {we are on display.On Display there is {an Entertainment Judge,a Marching {Judge,a Music Judge,& a Time Judge. {We have a red & black banner which has {the Band's name on in, black ribbon.
